title: Could not connect to the http server.
body: Pls Rito this hurts me inside.

replies.body: im having same problem
I'm on Optus in Sydney. Friend from Canberra can log in just fine. If you're from Sydney, it could be local.
It looks like Optus experienced issues tonight.  They are tracking some of them on their [service status](http://optus.custhelp.com/app/service/status/list) page

Thanks. It's a shame they haven't detected the one in my area. The strange thing is I have access to every server except the client's and your player support page's. 

...? I don't understand how it can be so specific. EVERYTHING WORKS EXCEPT LoL! I believe it, but *how* is this possible when it has nothing to do with you guys?
ahhh, one of the reasons y I hate Australia's internet... it sucks compared to the rest of the world Q.Q{{item:3073}}
I think quite a few are!

Optus players, please check out http://optus.custhelp.com/app/service/status/list for the latest outage notices. 
Looks like a large number of Optus players are having issues.
Doesn't seem i'm on that list neither. Either they forgot to add Parramatta to that list or my service might be linked to a different suburb.

Yea i think so
Im from that area so wtf
im with optus and im not on that list   and i can still connect to the internet  but not lol ??

everything works, skype, google, facebook everything, except for LoL, I'm having similar issues but now i have connection failure unable to connect to pvp.net server. I live in inner west sydney area near greenacre.
I KNOW! WTF. EVERYTHING. EXCEPT LoL!! :@
same here :/
im begining to miss  pando media boost  it never had these constant problems   all the time  and since this new client it has only been trouble shoots and issues

> im begining to miss  pando media boost  it never had these constant problems   all the time  and since this new client it has only been trouble shoots and issues

You do realize Pando Media Booster had a virus in it, hence why it was dropped.
Mind you, dropped months way to late.
i never had one single issue with it    was fine and if it did have a virus in it  says alot about this current client and all the issues it has
I am having the same problem like wtf.  I am from optus .

still not working, been trying for over an hour with all the different work arounds... nothing works, don't bother wasting your time, just wait till they fix it

just watching gladiator on ch 7 so not all bad
Im with Dodo in a town called Forster, been having troubles all day.
im in ipswich with optus having trouble logging on too my son logged on at his dads he has telstra and it worked but didnt here with optus

I haven't been able to log in to LoL tonight either,  I'm with OPTUS. However I am currently logged in after using a VPN through the states to the OCE server. I tested the ping and it's 740 so completely unplayable. Seems like it's a problem with the routing from OPTUS servers to the LoL servers.
Edit: I have also just logged in using my phone as a modem which is a Telstra Mobile which is giving me about 55 ping.

Im the same im in sydney and i cant connect to lol its so annoying everything else is perfect but my league of legends i thought my league was stuffed so i tried the run admistrator, i deleted the game and installed it again and restarted my computer and my internet so i hope optus fix this stuff plz optus hopefully 2morrow i can play {{champion:17}} why u do dis to me teemo{{champion:17}}
give up guys riot  doesnt care they will blame it on optus and leave it at that ill play another game till they pull there act together

It's clearly Optus (which uses telstra lines, so telstra might be at fault too). Don't blame Riot, even if it appears as though the only server affected is Riot's. My friend can log in, she's from Canberra. Therefore it's a local ISP issue, not Riot's issue, hence, their server status is "online".
im with optus i just played  planet side 2 but cant access lol  it not optus  if it was i wouldnt be able to access any game online for said outage but only game i cant access is lol
HAHA its not optus though. Cant get on with Optus, Telstra or Voda Mobile. Fix now or rito
I'm with Exetel (Telstra wholesale) and I'm having the same problem, so annoying.
Could play about 4 hours ago, but cant log on now
i can connect to  other games eg dc universe online   and  planetside 2     but cannnot connect to  lol    plz fix soon riot it clear not a optus thing
I'm in Ballarat on Optus ADSL and I can't get in -- also seem to have lost access to support.riotgames.com too.
Can confirm, Optus cable Sydney here and can't go past the login screen. But it looks like my area is still fixing so now I know.

if my internet drops out. LoL's forum wouldn't cross my mind to test whether the internet is working. If they haven't said anything about the issue then it probably means they haven't found out what the issue is. Optus outage is a distraction in my eye to the players until they find the problem. And also after, time to find the solution
I'm in Melbourne on Optus but my area isn't listed on the outage notices. I managed to fix the client not opening but whenever I try to login it fails.
The same problem in gold coast....
didn't work for me, game opened a little while ago but now won't progress past login screen anyway
i had same prob i then went back thru the desktop icon but  and it let me thru but  has since then happened again i think it  a optus or lol issue
if Optus is having outages, the players wouldn't be able to connect to the forums.

http://i.imgur.com/OZj7qA0.png

Are you getting this prompt on launching the client? 
Client was working fine prior yesterday...
I was gonna make a new thread but I think you are having the same problem as me :/

I couldn't even reinstall the game. The link to the installer seems unavailable, had to use a proxy to download it for me, even then I couldn't connect to download the game again. 

I'm on Optus in Melbourne, using a cable connection
PC is running Windows 7 Ultimate, 64bit
Already checked firewall and allowed stuff, not blocked in hosts file
If you need more information to check into just holla
I'm from Melbourne as well and i'm having the same issue.
Also Optus Cable Melbourne. Have managed to get to the login screen now but no further :'(
